Package at.ac.tuwien.policenauts.l4.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Asteroid
    The asteroid class, representing an asteroid game object.
    Collectible
    An object which can be picked up by a player, having a positive effect in most cases.
    Game
    The main game object, used for loading resources and rendering.
    GameLoop
    Run the gameloop and make sure to update/render the game logic in the process.
    GameObject
    Interface for every object being drawn in the game view.
    IndestructibleAsteroid
    An asteroid, not destructable by a railgun shot.
    Invincibility
    A powerup causing the player to be temporarily invincible.
    Level
    Container for all level related information.
    LevelLoader
    Load a level from a specified xml file.
    NonPlayerObject
    Interface for all GameObjects on the screen which are not the player.
    Oxygen
    A powerup restoring depleted oxygen by a few points.
    PersistenceDb
    Class handling persistence layer database access.
    Player
    Main class for controlling the player and interaction of the player with the surrounding objects.
    RailgunAmmo
    A collectible restoring the railgun ammo of a player.
    ResolutionConverter
    Helper class for using resolution independent pixel calculation.
    ScoreAccess
    Class handling SqlLite based Score Access.
    ScoreContract
    Contract class containing definitions of constants for the db.
    ScoreContract.ScoreEntry
    Provides constants for an entry in Score table.
    ScoreProvider
    ContentProvider class providing db content.
    Segment
    A segment of a level, containing references to all visible objects.
    SimpleAsteroid
    A simple, destructible asteroid.
    SoundManager
    Load music for usage in-game.
    Sprite
    Sprite class, store information about sprite rendering.
    TextureManager
    Load and store textures for reuse across objects.
